ing: 2 tart green apples, cored and diced
1/2 (8 ounce) bottle raspberry vinaigrette salad dressing
des: "This easy salad recipe will thrill all of your guests! A bowl of mixed greens is adorned with bits of apple, chopped walnuts, and Gorgonzola or feta cheese, and tossed with a prepared raspberry vinaigrette."
ins: In a large bowl, combine salad greens, walnuts, cheese, and apples. Toss with raspberry vinaigrette, and serve.
